title: Coronavirus: Last night of the pubs as lockdown begins
description: Bars and alehouses across England mark the final night of business before closing to customers.

title: Covid-19: What's happening with schools?
description: The government has closed all schools, but what does that mean for exams, and who can still go in?

title: Ryder Cup: Paul Casey would support postponement of tournament
description: Paul Casey says he would support any decision to postpone the Ryder Cup because of the coronavirus crisis.

title: County season delayed until at least 28 May
description: The start of the domestic season is delayed by at least seven weeks because of the coronavirus crisis.

description: No exams, no prom, no farewells - how does it feel to have your school days come to an end abruptly?

description: Australia is severely restricting access to remote Aboriginal communities amid coronavirus fears.

title: Foodbanks, phone calls, online coaching - how are Premier League clubs helping?
description: With Premier League football cancelled until at least 30 April, BBC Sport looks at how teams are trying to help out.

title: Coronavirus: M&S invokes wartime spirit as virus impact hits
description: In a gloomy trading update the retailer says it served customers during world wars will continue to do so.

title: Watch FA Cup 'rewind' quarter-final highlights on Sunday afternoon

title: 'UKA board changed stance over coach Salazar'
description: A report into how UK Athletics handled its relationship with disgraced coach Alberto Salazar found the board changed its stance on severing ties with him.

title: F1 offers 'light relief' with virtual grand prix series
description: Formula 1 launches an esports grand prix series featuring current drivers to ensure fans can continue to follow the season virtually.

title: World Snooker Championship postponed because of coronavirus
description: The World Snooker Championship, due to start at the Crucible on 18 April, is postponed because of the coronavirus pandemic.

title: Coronavirus: How radio and TV hosts are keeping their shows on air from home
description: The One Show and The World At One are among the shows broadcasting from presenters' homes.

title: Coronavirus: Man arrested for 'failing to self-isolate' on Isle of Man
description: An emergency coronavirus law in the Isle of Man means arrivals must quarantine themselves for 14 days.

title: Is Iran covering up its outbreak?
description: Iran has seen one of the worst coronavirus outbreaks but the true scale may be being downplayed.

title: Coronavirus: Chancellor prepares wage package rescue plan

description: Self-employed workers say they urgently need help to survive the financial impacts of the pandemic.

description: Jude Ikuenobe was falsely accused on social media of using a Covid-19 patient to extort money.

title: Coronavirus: Why are Southwold and Lowestoft faring so differently?
description: Southwold and Lowestoft are 14 miles apart but one has plenty of visitors and the other is a ghost town.

description: With scores of people self-isolating, how can people celebrate this Mother's Day?
